website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a sturdy no-frills ladle that's easy to use and inexpensive, you'd have a difficult time finding a better option.
pros: This basic ladle is made of nylon, with a top that holds up well to high temperatures
Suitable to use with non-stick cookware
Handle has a soft texture that makes it easy to grip
cons: Doesn't feel quite as durable as some pricier ladles
The downside of the soft grip is that the coating can peel or melt if it comes in direct contact with heat elements

customer_reviews.title: Needed A New Ladle
customer_reviews.text: & this one fit the bill! We moved into a new home about 6 months ago & I seem to have misplaced my old ladle during the transition. Every time I cooked soup or something really saucy I thought to myself “Dang it, I forgot to buy one at the store again!” (Go figure) So I finally got an amazon and bought this one! I liked the price and it works just great! This is all you really need, and I don’t see why I would need a fancier, more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: My wife left me because she argues with my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.text: Not too resistant to heat. Thought it was a larger spoon to heat my ‘stuff’ up with. So flic went the bic and I wish I was off on a trip man. Needles to say. Lol. Get it! Guess it works. It ladles my soup! What more of a review do you need! 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Vance Gloder

customer_reviews.title: Good Product at a Bargain Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement to an OXO Good Grips Ladle that came in an older set. It’s fine, very sturdy but I wish the middle was a little flexible like my old one was. Might have to do with how plastics are manufactured now vs 10+ years ago, I guess to make it more eco-friendly and less toxic? For the price it more than does the job, and still coordinates with my existing set.
customer_reviews.author: LmShaw

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My old ladle disappeared so I ordered this OXO ladle because it's a brand I love and trust. This isn't one of those cutesy utensils you see in cooking blogs, but it's perfectly sturdy and functional as a ladle should be. I need it as I make a lot of soups and curries during fall and winter. For all you utilitarians out there, this is the ladle for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Keogh

customer_reviews.title: also a weapon
customer_reviews.text: I would not hesitate to say this could be used to spank the kids if they are bad and are trying to get into the food early. It is strong, good price, and also scoops soup, salsa, taco salad, and chicken and dumplings into a BOWL!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ladle, perfect for nonstick pans
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no complaints. Dishwasher safe, comfy in my hand. Got this for nonstick pans, to supplement my beloved stainless steel ladle. Another excellent OXO product.
customer_reviews.author: Catspaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladle -- relatively large
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sturdy ladle. It is relatively large, so great if you are making large batches of soup/chili.
customer_reviews.author: dbjanes

customer_reviews.title: XO nice kitchen product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of XO utensils but it never included ladle. Glad I could find it here. Love the slim base and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladle and it doesn’t have any areas where the plastic comes apart where food can get stuck. My husband hasn’t melted it yet like he did the last one so that’s a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Ladles things!
customer_reviews.text: It's a ladle! It ladles things! It doesn't feel cheap, but also isn't expensive. I like it so much that, when I lost my first one, I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is cheap, but the handle is not heat resistant, and other aspects are good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this simply because I accidentally dropped my previous one onto a lit burner and half melted it. But so long as you are not as clumsy as me - this is a fine, durable, well appointed ladle for all your ladle needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P. Knave

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect to use from pot to bowl in a family ...
customer_reviews.text: I have many stainless steel pots and pans but have been switching to ceramic lined with a few anodized aluminum. Although both the ceramic and anodized manufacturers state metal utensils are safe. I have my doubts. This nylon ladle removes all worry. It is well proportioned and weighted. It is perfect to use from pot to bowl in a family setting, or from pot to tureen after which you use a classy stainless or silver ladle to serve.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: this works!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle, very sturdy quality item, easy to scoop soup with
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good Ladle
customer_reviews.text: I like the long handle, and it is a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I wish the spoon was shaped like my old one.
customer_reviews.text: It should have a shape that is pour friendly on the sides like my old one did. My old one was use friendly and this isn't. This is well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MNM

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle. Sturdy and easy to wash!
customer_reviews.text: This actually is very sturdy and works great! I didn’t expect it to, because apparently I’ve always used crap ladles.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good ladle
customer_reviews.text: Solid ladle, I like that it doesn’t have a hooked handle, this makes it fit better in my utensil jar. Hopefully it will hold up better than my previous one that split in half.
customer_reviews.author: Grrrrrrll

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great ladle. Cleans easily. Definitely heat resistant too. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: WOW! What a ladle!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing and impressive ladle I have ever used. Before I used this ladle, I had no idea how wonderful scooping soup could be. You can now too with the OXXO ladle. THANKS OXXO LADLE!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Good size with durable construction.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty rough on my cooking utensils, this one looks like it will last.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate one, so I need to buy a new one and this one is very good!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for all your ladling needs

The handle has a nice grip but is easy to clean, not sticky like some "grippy" handles can be.I bought one for my mom and plan on buying one for myself. Another great OXO product that will last a lifetime.

customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, good design, feels solid, OXO is always a solid pick for the most part when it comes to kitchen items like this.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I rarely use it but when I do retrieve it from the dishwasher I look at it like wow this is a nice one. Decently balanced! I was worried as the oxo spoon I have has a heavy handle that causes it to flip out of the pan and spill spoon contents all over the floor. Seems like a good mix of stiffness and flex as well. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: It's a ladle - heavy duty construction and nice and deep - unlike others, so no mess and nice amount to pour.

customer_reviews.title: Love this utensil

customer_reviews.title: It looks great in my crock on the counter

The design has changed a lot since OXO was introduced many years ago, and this new design is sleek looking. It looks great in my crock on the counter! I will soon replace more of my old OXO with the new style.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This ladle works great and washes up well in the top rack of the dishwasher. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: OXO Rules!
customer_reviews.text: Every OXO product that I buy is better than any other brand. This ladle is no exception. It is well balanced, the cup is large enough to minimize spills and the handle is comfortable. It washes well and doesn't discolor. What more could you ask from your ladle?

customer_reviews.text: The handle has a nice quality feel to it, and it doesn't bow out when lifting heavy things like chili. It also cleans up great in the dishwasher. Great value.

customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected. It is the perfect size for dipping food out of my slow cooker.

customer_reviews.text: We really like this ladle because it is sturdy and has a nice ergonomic design. The pieces fit together tightly so food doesn't get stuck in the crack.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well but is a little bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well but is a little bigger than I thought it would be. Then again your soup pot might be bigger or deeper.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & functional
customer_reviews.text: Well made, simple yet elegant design. Handles hot temperatures well and the spoon is big enough for serving soups. I wish I had find out about OXO products before!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well. Been through the dishwasher with no issues. Looks nice for a plastic utensil.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! Doesn't bend when you're using it. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and scratchy edge
customer_reviews.text: I usually like Oxo products so it’s unfortunate this didn’t work out. I bought this ladle to use to scoop porridge out of my nonstick rice cooker. I cut off the tag, started using it and noticed the front lip of the ladle was poorly made and actually quite sharp to the touch; likely to be able to scratch the non stick surface! And now that I’ve used it once, I’m pretty sure I can’t return it. :-( Lesson learned, fully examine the item before using! Not just visually but actually touch it to make sure it’s smooth and really non scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what you already have in your kitchen arsenal, this may be just the ladle you're looking for. I was replacing a deeper, larger, metal ladle, and this OXO ladle is perfect for my needs. It's safe for nonstick surfaces, heat resistant enough not to melt if you leave it leaning against the pot, and shaped well for getting all but the last few drops out of the pot. I was worried from other reviews that it might not hold enough, but I haven't found that to be the case. In my opinion, this is the only ladle you need.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Great Really
customer_reviews.text: great really... what can I say... sturdy... attractive... would buy again and recommend

customer_reviews.text: This ladle is very well designed. Comfortable grip, rigid handle, sturdy scooper thing there on the end. It works great and it's easy to wash. Someone who understands the shortcomings of ordinary ladles helped make this one extraordinary.

customer_reviews.title: It's a ladle
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a ladle? Long handle; should last forever. This one is nylon, so fine for non-stick pans. I bought it for use with a new non-stick electric skillet, but I didn't think through the purchase. Like most ladles, it is round. And that doesn't work well with my skillet. So I replaced it with a Farberware stirring spoon bought at the grocery store for 1/5th the cost. My fault.
